channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-17587] Kinit with keytab should not display the keytab file's full path in any logs
item.description: The keytab is sensitive information, and the full path should not be printed in the log
item.summary: Kinit with keytab should not display the keytab file's full path in any logs

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

Sushma_28 thanks for reporting and uploading the patch.. Patch lgtm, as this is sensitive info can be avoided logging.
Committed to trunk and branch-3.3. Sushma_28 thanks for contribution.
